channel.title: Comments on: On2 : transfinite number hacking

item.title: By: Billy
item.dc:creator: Billy
item.description: Great article! I have a question (that I will think about): does this let you operate with elements in the algebraic closure of F_2? Take a polynomial with coefficients in F_2. Is there a way of computing the ordinals corresponding to the roots of the polynomial?
item.content:encoded: Great article! I have a question (that I will think about): does this let you operate with elements in the algebraic closure of F_2? Take a polynomial with coefficients in F_2. Is there a way of computing the ordinals corresponding to the roots of the polynomial?
